info.name: Rainbow Tumblr Dashboard Theme
info.description:
**this is no longer going to be updated**

A light minimalist dashboard theme, with a rainbow header.



B&W Dash Photos & Circle Avatars were used in the image above.
info.additionalInfo:
12/25/17

  • Fixed blue background that shows up behind the horizontal list of blogs when you search something
  • Made title and 'Related' results more visible when you search something

      • 4/25/18

      • Fixed issue with avatars being too zoomed in
